com.example.kappapridesms

Class ConversationRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.kappapridesms.ConversationRepository

  • public class ConversationRepository
extends java.lang.Object
    ConversationRepository functions as a central hub for all the message data, conversation data, contact data, and blacklist data. Users of this class retrieve a singleton instance through the getInstance() method. Hence, all modifications to the data are reflected in every retrieved instance since there is only one instance.

    Contains four private attributes:

    - m_instance

    - m__conversations

    - m_targetConversation

    - m_blacklist

    Contains nine public methods:

    - addConversation()

    - getInstance()

    - getBlacklist()

    - getConversation()

    - getTargetConversation()

    - loadConversations()

    - setTargetConversation()

    - getContactName()

    - getPhoneNumber()

    Author:
    Nathan Beck

      • getContactName

        public java.lang.String getContactName(java.lang.String phoneNumber,
                                       android.content.Context context)
        Method that gets the contact name by using two parameters received: phoneNumber and context. phoneNumber being the phone number of the contact and the context being the Activity.
        Parameters:
        phoneNumber - String that holds the value of the phone number.
        context - Current state of the application.
        Returns:
        String value of the name of the contact retrieved from the Android ContactsContract class.

      • getPhoneNumber

        public java.lang.Long getPhoneNumber(java.lang.String name,
                                     android.content.Context context)
        Method that gets the phone number using two parameters: name and context. name being the name of the contact and context being the current state of the application.
        Parameters:
        name - String value of the name of the contact.
        context - Current state of the application.
        Returns:
        Long value of the phone number retrieved from the Android ContactsContract class.
